Class VirtualMIDI

  • java.lang.Object
    • launchpad_s_plus.SetMidiMessage
      • launchpad_s_plus.VirtualMIDI

  • public class VirtualMIDI
extends SetMidiMessage
    Contains the simplified methods needed to send Virtual MIDI messages
    Author:
    Helion

      • found

        public static boolean found()
        Checks if there is the ability to use Virtual MIDI Messages
        Returns:
